alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 10:11PM EDT until November 01 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the most-persistent snow. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Cuyahoga and Lake counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates should exceed 1 inch per hour at times this evening and overnight tonight. Snow accumulations will be extremely limited along the lakeshore with the greatest totals expected south of the I-90 corridor.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
